amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding for the National Ignition Facility by $122.5 million and increase funding for nuclear nonproliferation activities by $66 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the account for Weapons Activities in Title III by $122,500,000 and to increase the account for Defense Nuclear Nonproliferation by $66,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kucinich amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 91 - 331 (Roll no. 202).
